Nitobi.RowCountItem

Public Member Functions

 RowCountItem ()

Detailed Description

A grid toolbar item that will show the number of rows known to be in the grid.

This class will only show the value provided by the grid's javascript method getrid.datatable.getRemoveRowCount(). If the remote row count is not know, the value shown will be the count known at the time.

To ensure the grid shows an acurate Row count, be sure to provide the grid data provider with a getTotalDataSize event handler that will query for the real row count. The grid will use this to push the known row count to the grid and this item will show that value.
